item.title: quizme: An R Package to Create and Practice Any Learning Material
item.description: While writing code for your project, we often hit a roadblock, when we know what we want to achieve but are unaware if a function to carry that task already exists. We quickly go to the search bar of our choice and ask what we are looking for. Almost always stackoverflow is at the top of the search and some expert’s code is right there to rescue us. We get delighted, take a note somewhere (my favorite’s are stickies) to remember that for future and continue with our project.
